tool_description: Provided by OCRLy.biz, this image to text processor is very accurate and used by IT teams to convert images of error screenshots to text in their zendesk accounts for example.
name: OCRLY image to text
title: OCRLY image to text

api_list.name: image2text
api_list.description: Provide the image url and filename and get back the text in the image as html. We do not store anything on our server.

required_parameters.name: imageurl
required_parameters.description: The url must be accessible  online. Cannot be behind a firewall or authentication.

required_parameters.name: filename
required_parameters.description: the filename must be a string plus a dot plus a file extension. Example: image1.png or myimage.bmp
